Package iiv.display

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LocationMapping
    LocationMapping defines routines to allow handling display location mapping for a component.
    NumberFormattable
    NumberFormattable defines routines to allow setting number formatting rules for numbers generated and displayed by a component.
    Overlayable
    Overlayable defines methods to allow creating overlays for a component.
    ShowPointControllerInterface
    ShowPointControllerInterface defines methods from ShowPointDialog to allow running with ShowPointDialog absent.
    ShowPointDialogInterface
    ShowPointDialogInterface defines methods from ShowPointDialog to allow running with ShowPointDialog absent.
    ShowPointDisplay
    ShowPointDisplay defines methods for displaying values at a voxel location.
    ShowPointImage
    ShowPointImage defines methods for a component to display voxel values.
    ShowPointTracker
    ShowPointTracker defines methods for tracking values at a voxel location.
    SliceNumbering
    SliceNumbering defines routines to allow setting the slice of data displayed by a component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CNUColorModel
    CNUColorMap extends IndexColorModel to define some standard tools.
    CNUContainer
    This is a basic display container window for iiV.
    CNUDisplay
    This is the primary display container window for iiV.
    CNUDisplayConstraints
    Defines contstraints passed to addImpl of CNUDisplay when adding components.
    ColorMapCanvas
    Canvas to display a color map.
    ColorMapQuiltCanvas
    Canvas to display a color map quilt.
    ComponentGroup
    Container to treat a group of components as one.
    DisplayBox
    DisplayBox represents a component to display a box.
    DisplayColorMap
    Component to display a color map as a horizontal or vertical bar.
    DisplayColorMapQuilt
    Component to display a color map as a quilt.
    DisplayComponent
    DisplayComponent defines standard routines specific to a components displayed by iiV.
    DisplayComponentDefaults
    DisplayComponentDefaults defines default values used when creating display components.
    DisplayDraw
    DisplayDraw is an abstract class that defines standard routines for graphics drawing display components.
    DisplayImagePopupMenu
    This is the popup menu for images displayed by iiV.
    DisplayLine
    Component to display a line.
    DisplayOval
    Component to display an oval.
    DisplayShape
    Abstract class representing basics for displaying a shape.
    DisplayText
    Component to display text.
    GreyColorModel
    GreyColorModel is a 256 index grey scale color model.
    iiVTransferable
    iiVTransferable is a rapper class for transfering iiV components to the clipboard.
    IntensityProjectionImage
    Component to display a maximum intensity projection of CNUData as an image with flip, zoom and show point abilities.
    ScriptableDisplayComponent  
    ShowPointController
    Dialog to display coordinate values and locations.
    ShowPointDisplayLine
    ShowPointDisplayLine displays show point info as a single formatted line.
    SimplePolygon
    Class that defines a simple polygon for drawing.
    SingleComponentCanvas
    Container to display a single component.
    SingleImg
    Component to display a single slice of CNUData as an image with flip, zoom and show point abilities.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ColorMapException
    Class to represent an exception generated reading a color map.
